directions: In a bowl toss shrimp with recado and marinate until grill is ready, about 30 minutes. Grill shrimp on a well-oiled rack set 5 to 6 inches over glowing coals, turning them occasionally, until crusty, opaque, and charred, about 4 minutes.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds large shrimp (about 33), shelled and deveined
title: Grilled Shrimp with Tamarind Recado
